title: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey
description: Set in 431 BC during the Pelopenesian War, play as either a male or female mercenary as you embark on your own epic odyssey to become a legendary Spartan hero in a world where every choice matters.

title: The Last of Us II
description: Five years after the events of The Last of Us, Ellie embarks on another journey through a post-apocalyptic America on a mission of vengeance against a mysterious militia.

title: Crysis 3
description: Prophet is forced to save New York City from CELL after the alien invasion in Crysis 2 (2011).

title: Half-Life 2
description: Dr. Freeman is taken out of stasis by his "employer" to help rid the planet of invading aliens forces known as the Combine that entered through the portals he helped create.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: In a primitive tribal world where strange, monstrous, animalistic machines roam the wilderness, a brave young female warrior goes on a quest to learn the truth about her mysterious origin and the state the world is in.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: After a century of hibernation, Link reawakens to once again save a ruined Hyrule from a great evil.

title: Subway Surfers
description: Subway Surfers is an endless runner mobile game.

title: The Order: 1886
description: The Order: 1886 is set in an alternate history of London, where an old order of knights keep all of the world safe from half breed monsters, who are a combination of animal and man.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A monster hunter for hire embarks on an epic journey to find his former apprentice before The Wild Hunt can capture her and bring about the destruction of the world.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: After escaping execution, the last living Dragonborn must grow in strength and power to defeat the dragons that have once again begun to plague the land of Skyrim.
